\maketitle

\section{Introduction}

This is doc2.  We'll reuse some chunks with a few changes and pickup
the values that were cached during the processing of doc1.

\begin{Schunk}
\begin{Sinput}
> set.seed(123)
> b <- rnorm(3)
> firstB <- b
> c <- runif(3) * 2
> z <- b + c
> z
\end{Sinput}
\end{Schunk}


\begin{Schunk}
\begin{Sinput}
> firstB
\end{Sinput}
\begin{Soutput}
[1] -0.5604756 -0.2301775  1.5587083
\end{Soutput}
\begin{Sinput}
> b
\end{Sinput}
\begin{Soutput}
[1] 2.112422 3.569676 2.205740
\end{Soutput}
\begin{Sinput}
> c
\end{Sinput}
\begin{Soutput}
[1] 1.056211 1.784838 1.102870
\end{Soutput}
\begin{Sinput}
> z
\end{Sinput}
\begin{Soutput}
[1] 0.4957353 1.5546606 2.6615783
\end{Soutput}
\end{Schunk}


\end{document}
